code: import{useState}from"react";import Item from"./Item";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function PackingList(_ref){let{items,onDeleteItems,onItemPacked,onDeleteAllItems}=_ref;const[SortBy,setSortBy]=useState("input");let sortedItems;if(SortBy==="input")sortedItems=items;if(SortBy==="description")sortedItems=items.slice().sort((a,b)=>a.description.localeCompare(b.description));if(SortBy==="packed")sortedItems=items.slice().sort((a,b)=>Number(a.packed)-Number(b.packed));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:sortedItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Item,{item:item,onDeleteItems:onDeleteItems,onItemPacked:onItemPacked},item.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"actions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:SortBy,onChange:e=>setSortBy(e.target.value),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"input",children:"sort by input order"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"description",children:"sort by description"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"packed",children:"sort by packed"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:onDeleteAllItems,children:"Clear List"})]})]});}
